abstract: Diamond Foods said on Wednesday that it had won some relief from its biggest lenders, as the troubled food company sought to raise additional capital to shore up its balance sheet.
snippet: Diamond Foods said on Wednesday that it had won some relief from its biggest lenders, as the troubled food company sought to raise additional capital to shore up its balance sheet.
lead_paragraph: Diamond Foods said on Wednesday that it had won some relief from its biggest lenders, as the troubled food company sought to raise additional capital to shore up its balance sheet, including by talking to private equity firms.

headline.main: Diamond Foods Wins Breathing Room From Lenders

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
